overview: Involved in a series of successful startups within media, e-commerce, financial services and mobile communication. With the founding of UniRush Financial Services Mr. Marshall is credited with creating the general purpose prepaid category in 2000 and developing unique products and services that cater to an underserved global audience. He provides a unique entrepreneurial perspective that is rooted in diverse areas of expertise, including: technology, strategy, finance and media. Goal is to assist other entrepreneurs in realizing a shared vision that access to basic financial, healthcare and communication services can provide revolutionary change in society.
